review.reviewBody: The order is too good and preparation is so good that i love it its too hot and crispy and special thanks to harinder the employee of kfc which help me a lot and prepare my order
the chicken burger was the driest burger I've ever had in my life. it's like they microwaved it. really disappointed in this location. yall should do better
Food is not cooked well and the  taste is so bad.
chicken was saturated in oil. it was so bad, it pooled in the bottom of the bucket 🤮
Got a bucket and only 1/6 pieces looked like it belonged any where near a human. The pieces were all bone and smaller than the average kfc workers d**k.
